question: Which fictional superhero will be the first entrant into Comic-Con Museum’s  Character Hall of Fame?
explanation: Batman will be first inductee into the Comic-Con Museum\'s Character Hall of Fame. The honor was announced during the \"Happy Birthday Batman!\" panel at WonderCon on March 30, when Batman turned 80. The ceremony will take place at the Federal Building in San Diego’s Balboa Park — which is the future site of the Comic-Con Museum, on 17th July 2019.  The ceremony will be accompanied by an exhibit of Batman-themed memorabilia and related props and will feature appearances by celebrities and creators whose careers have interacted with the Dark Knight across the years. Batman first appeared in the \'Detective Comics No. 27\' published on March 30, 1939, created by Bob Kane and Bill Finger.
